query:
INSERT INTO articles (title, slug, excerpt, content, featuredImage, status, authorId, publishedAt)
VALUES 
(
  'Tirana Hosts International Tech Summit 2026',
  'tirana-hosts-international-tech-summit-2026',
  'Albania''s capital welcomes over 2,000 technology leaders and innovators for the region''s largest tech conference, showcasing the country''s growing digital economy.',
  'Tirana is set to become the center of technological innovation in Southeast Europe as it hosts the International Tech Summit 2026 from March 15-17. The three-day event will bring together more than 2,000 entrepreneurs, investors, developers, and tech enthusiasts from across the globe.

The summit, held at the newly renovated Tirana International Convention Center, will feature keynote speeches from leading figures in artificial intelligence, blockchain, and sustainable technology. Major tech companies including Microsoft, Google, and several European startups have confirmed their participation.

"This summit represents Albania''s commitment to becoming a regional tech hub," said Digital Minister Belinda Balluku. "We have invested heavily in digital infrastructure, education, and creating a favorable environment for tech startups. The results are already visible."

Albania''s tech sector has experienced remarkable growth, with over 150 new startups launched in the past two years. The government''s "Digital Albania" initiative has streamlined public services, improved internet connectivity, and established innovation hubs in major cities.

The summit will also showcase Albania''s achievements in e-governance, with the country ranking among the top performers in the Western Balkans for digital public services. Attendees will have the opportunity to explore partnerships, investment opportunities, and learn about the latest technological trends shaping the future.',
  NULL,
  'published',
  1,
  DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 2 DAY)
),
(
  'Albanian National Team Qualifies for Euro 2028',
  'albanian-national-team-qualifies-euro-2028',
  'Historic victory secures Albania''s place in the European Championship, marking a golden era for Albanian football.',
  'In a moment that will be remembered for generations, the Albanian national football team has secured qualification for Euro 2028 following a dramatic 2-1 victory over Poland in Tirana. The Air Albania Stadium erupted in celebration as the final whistle confirmed Albania''s place among Europe''s elite football nations.

The qualifying campaign has been nothing short of spectacular, with Albania finishing second in their group behind Germany. Under the guidance of coach Sylvinho, the team has displayed tactical discipline, attacking flair, and an unbreakable spirit that has captured the hearts of fans across the nation.

Star striker Armando Broja, who scored the winning goal against Poland, expressed his emotions: "This is a dream come true. We have worked so hard for this moment, and to do it in front of our incredible fans makes it even more special."

The qualification represents a significant milestone for Albanian football. It comes after years of investment in youth development, improved training facilities, and a growing presence of Albanian players in top European leagues.

Football Federation president Armand Duka praised the team''s achievement: "This qualification is the result of a long-term vision and commitment to excellence. Our players have shown that Albanian football belongs on the biggest stage."

Celebrations continued throughout the night in Tirana and cities across Albania, with thousands of fans gathering in Skanderbeg Square to celebrate this historic achievement. The government has announced that the team will be honored with a special reception.',
  NULL,
  'published',
  1,
  DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 5 DAY)
),
(
  'New Archaeological Discovery in Butrint Rewrites Ancient History',
  'new-archaeological-discovery-butrint-rewrites-ancient-history',
  'International team of archaeologists uncovers remarkably preserved Roman villa with stunning mosaics at the UNESCO World Heritage site.',
  'A groundbreaking archaeological discovery at Butrint National Park is providing new insights into life in ancient Illyria. An international team of archaeologists has unearthed a remarkably well-preserved Roman villa featuring intricate mosaics, frescoes, and artifacts dating back to the 2nd century AD.

The discovery, made during routine excavations in the southern section of the ancient city, includes a complex of rooms adorned with colorful geometric mosaics and walls decorated with frescoes depicting mythological scenes. The level of preservation is exceptional, with some colors remaining vibrant after nearly two millennia.

Dr. Elena Korkuti, lead archaeologist on the project, described the find as "extraordinary": "What we have discovered here challenges our understanding of Roman influence in this region. The sophistication of the artwork and the scale of the villa suggest that Butrint was far more important as a cultural and economic center than previously thought."

Among the most significant finds are several marble sculptures, bronze household items, and a collection of coins that provide valuable information about trade routes and economic connections with other parts of the Roman Empire. Preliminary analysis suggests the villa belonged to a wealthy merchant or government official.

The Albanian Ministry of Culture has announced plans to incorporate the new discoveries into the existing Butrint museum complex, with special viewing platforms being constructed to allow visitors to observe ongoing excavation work. The site, already a UNESCO World Heritage location, is expected to attract increased international attention following this discovery.',
  NULL,
  'published',
  1,
  DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)
);

INSERT INTO article_categories (articleId, categoryId)
SELECT 2, id FROM categories WHERE slug = 'technology'
UNION ALL
SELECT 3, id FROM categories WHERE slug = 'sports'
UNION ALL
SELECT 4, id FROM categories WHERE slug = 'culture';
command:

INSERT INTO article_categories (articleId, categoryId)
SELECT 2, id FROM categories WHERE slug = 'technology'
